annotations:
Dear Sirs,
Please offer firm and rated cargoes for
our follow direct and exclusive tonnage:
M/V Lady Mariia
Russian flag
RO-RO/LO-LO Multipurpose Vessel, STRENGTHENED FOR HEAVY CARGO,
EQUIPPED FOR THE CARRIAGE OF CONTAINERS, MC E3 AUT, IMO Class fitted
Length overall 126,84 M
Length between pp. 118,55 M
Breadth moulded 20,00 M
Depth to main deck 11,50 M
Draft summer 6,65 M
Height above keel 35,06 M
Deadweight summer 7270.0 MT
DWCC 5600 MT
GT/NT 8811 / 2793
Bale capacity 530000 cbft
2 holds + tweendeck
Floor space on deck 1535m2
Floor space under deck 2360m2
GEAR 2x150 MT SWL   combinable
Open Central Med  20-21 August  onw
ooking for cargoes to East Med, Turkey, Egypt, PG, India, Africa, Black Sea or Baltic
EU countries always excluded
+
M/V Anastasiia - BELUGA F-240 TYPE
Built 2006, Rus flag
MULTI-PURPOSE DRY CARGO SHIP – EQUPPED FOR CARRIAGE
OF CONTAINERS-HEAVY CARGO-UNRESTRICTED NAVIGATION
DWCC 11000 MT
GT/NT 9611 / 4260
Bale capacity 563340 cbft
Length overall 138,07 M
Length between pp. 130,00 M
Breadth moulded 21,00 M
Depth to main deck 11,00 M
Draft summer 8,00 M
Height above keel 39,62 M
Deadweight summer 12.737 MT
3 holds with tweendeck pontoons
Floor space on deck 1450m2
Floor space under deck 2810m2  incl tweendeck (1405m2)
GEAR 2 x120 MT SWL combinable
Open  Central Med  5th September onw
looking for cargoes to East Med, Turkey, Egypt, PG, India, Africa, Black Sea or Baltic
EU countries always excluded
--
Kind regards,
Maxim
MG Flot LLC, Chartering Dept
e-mail: chart@tmflot.ru
skype: maxminyaev
mob: +7 921 9485643
Click here to unsubscribe from this campaign.
